intent_atoms.description: RandomAccessReader error surface must be standardised using the RandomAccessReaderError taxonomy and propagated through kit readers and fixtures.
Add RandomAccessReaderError and RandomAccessReaderBoundsError enumerations to RandomAccessReader.swift with Sendable and Equatable conformance for safe concurrency diagnostics.
MappedReader and ChunkedFileReader must emit shared error cases (invalid offset/count, bounds, IO, overflow) while performing overflow-safe range calculations.
In-memory test reader and unit suites must cover new error behaviours: negative offsets, invalid counts, IO failure propagation, arithmetic overflow detection.

functional_units.name: RandomAccessReaderError Taxonomy
functional_units.description: Defines a standardized set of error types for random-access readers, including bounds and IO errors.

functional_units.name: RandomAccessReaderBoundsError Enumeration
functional_units.description: Specifies bounds-related error cases for random-access reader operations.

functional_units.name: MappedReader Error Handling
functional_units.description: Updates the MappedReader to emit shared error cases such as invalid offset/count, bounds, IO, and overflow during range calculations.

functional_units.name: ChunkedFileReader Error Handling
functional_units.description: Updates the ChunkedFileReader to emit shared error cases such as invalid offset/count, bounds, IO, and overflow during range calculations.

functional_units.name: In-Memory Test Reader
functional_units.description: Provides an in-memory reader for testing that covers new error behaviors like negative offsets, invalid counts.
